# Request for Information (RFI)  for Pay and Pension Solution for Senators

**Reference Number** | SEN-068 23-24
**Publication Date** | 24 January 2024
**Closing Date** | Proposals are **expired**

**Notice Summary**

The Senate of Canada invites interested vendors to provide information on a Pay and Pension solution for senators. This Request for Information (RFI) serves as a precursor to potential acquisition of a software solution.

**Background**

The Senate of Canada seeks to acquire a Human Resources software solution (UNSPSC: *43231505) for managing payroll and pension operations. The solution will assist the Senate in streamlining its HR processes.

**Contact Information**

To submit information, please send your response to:

Christine Tremblay  
christine.tremblay@sen.parl.gc.ca  
(613) 995-8888  
40 Elgin Street, 11th floor  
Ottawa, Ontario K1A 0A4, Canada

**Notice Document**

Please reference the following documents for more information:

- [Pay and Pension Solution RFI](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/30245/finproc_sen-068-23-24_e_pay-and-pension-solution.pdf)
- [Addendum No. 2](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/30245/addendum-no.-2---eng-final_0.pdf)
- [Amendment No. 1 - English Final](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/30245/amend-no.-1-eng.-final_0.pdf)

**Request Submission Guidelines**

- Interested vendors may submit information in response to this RFI.
- Proprietary information should be clearly marked.
- Vendors are not entitled to reimbursement of response-related costs.
- Information submitted will remain the property of the Senate of Canada and will not be returned.

**Additional Information**

Please note that a potential competitive solicitation may be released following this RFI. The Senate of Canada aims to maximize competition to obtain the best value.
